org.rcsb.mbt.model.attributes
Class BondRadiusAsWire

java.lang.Object
  org.rcsb.mbt.model.attributes.BondRadiusAsWire
All Implemented Interfaces:
BondRadius
public class BondRadiusAsWire
extends java.lang.Object
implements BondRadius

This class implements the BondRadius interface by applying a fixed radius representing the width IN PIXELS of the wireframe bond.

Author:
John L. Moreland
See Also:
BondRadius, Bond
